info.name: Near Infinity on Baldur's Gate Forums
AstroBryGuy's Mac OS X specific app packages of Near Infinity

changelog.entry: Expanded "Check for corrupted files" to check signature and version fields.
Enabled syntax highlighting for baldur.ini in Enhanced Edition games.
Updated option for turning on/off auto indentation in BCS script.
Added several new fields to WED resources.
Reassigned field "Wind speed" to "Overlay transparency" in ARE resources (EE only).
Added original/active class support to proficiency fields in CRE files as used by BG1 or IWD.
Replaced hardcoded list of strings for primary/secondary types in SPL resources and effect opcodes by values from related 2DA files.
Table column widths and height of bottom panels in structured resources will be remembered across sessions.
Added option to open WBM files in applications registered by the OS (which is usually a video player or web browser).
Several more clean ups, fixes and minor improvements.
A number of fixes and tweaks
